document.full_text: new rules installed after the 2004-5 lockout have sped up the game and made it more crowd pleasing, but they have also led to more high-speed collisions.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: g.m.'s will consider changes for player safety
lines_and_colors: new rules installed after the 2004-5 lockout have sped up the game and made it more crowd pleasing, but they have also led to more high-speed collisions.
